effects.display_string: Set: Mortal Strike and Cleave increase the damage of your next Overpower by 10%.
Set: When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Mortal Strike or Cleave has its damage increased by 10% and critical strike chance increased by 10%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Take what is rightfully yours, gorging on your target's essence to deal 3.4 million Shadow damage and healing you for 508,626 over 2 sec. Damage and healing increased based on the target's missing health.

Cooldown reduced by 60 sec if this effect kills the target. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,592 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 139 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

name: Order of the Cloud Serpent Tabard

reputation.display_string: Requires Order of the Cloud Serpent - Exalted

description: You truly belong here with us among the clouds.
